text: United States gubernatorial elections were held in 1929, in the state of Virginia. Virginia holds its gubernatorial elections in odd numbered years, every 4 years, following the United States presidential election year. == Results == {| class="wikitable" |- ! State !! Incumbent !! Party !! Status !! Opposing Candidates |- | Virginia || bgcolor="lightgrey"| Harry F. Byrd || Democratic || Term-limited, Democratic victory || John Garland Pollard (Democratic) 62.78% William Moseley Brown (Republican) 36.95% John J. Kafka (Socialist) 0.17% W. A. Rowe (Independent) 0.11% |} ==References== Category:November 1929 events
title: 1929 United States gubernatorial elections
